#### Fonseca

<b>Traho</b> -<b>is</b> -<b>xi</b> -<b>ctum</b> -<b>ere</b>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; <small>Sen.</small> &ensp; trazer por força. <br> <b>2</b> &ensp; <small>Sall.</small> &ensp; trazer para o castigo. <br> <b>3</b> &ensp; <small>Cic.</small> &ensp; attrahir, trazer, chamar a si. <br> <b>4</b> &ensp; <small>Plaut.</small> &ensp; trazer de rojo. <br> <b>5</b> &ensp; <small>Cic.</small> &ensp; excitar, mover, impellir. <br> <b>6</b> &ensp; receber, acquirir. <br> <b>7</b> &ensp; dilatar, demorar. </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>X</b><br>trahere animam &ensp; <small><small>Cic</small></small> &ensp; <small>Viver, respirar</small> <br> trahere animis &ensp; <small><small>Sall</small></small> &ensp; <small>Ponderar, considerar</small> <br> trahere aquam &ensp; <small><small>Sen</small></small> &ensp; <small>Fazer agoa a náo</small> <br> trahere odorem naribus &ensp; <small><small>Phaedr</small></small> &ensp; <small>Tomar o cheiro</small> <br> trahere originem ab aliquo &ensp; <small><small>Plin</small></small> &ensp; <small>Descender de alguem</small> <br> trahere pocula &ensp; <small><small>Hor</small></small> &ensp; <small>Beber</small> <br> trahere uultum &ensp; <small><small>Ovid</small></small> &ensp; <small>Carregar o semblante, mostrar-se sevéro</small> </p>




#### Velez

<b>Traho</b> -<b>is</b>   <p> <b>1</b> &ensp; trazer, levar de rasto, ou por força, ou sem ella &ensp; <small>Activ.</small> <br> <b>2</b> &ensp; <small>significat item in passiva</small> &ensp; dilatar-se, ou estender-se </p>   <p><small>[EXEMPLOS]</small><br> <br><b>2</b><br>bellum, uel conuiuium trahitur <br> <br><b>X</b><br>aquam ex puteis &ensp; <small>tirar a agua dos poços;</small> <br> ex copia rerum consilia trahere &ensp; <small>tirar, ou tomar os conselhos, etc</small> <br> noctem sermone trahebant &ensp; <small>passavaõ a noite com a practica</small> &ensp; <small><small>apud Virg. pro terebant</small></small> <br> originem a, uel e, uel ex regibus trahere &ensp; <small>trazer a origem dos Reys</small> </p>
